item.description:
Update 2:
We will be hiking on a set of trails at the end of the winery that are about 3.5 miles long. Nice set of trails in the woods.


Update:
If you plan on attending please RSVP and include any others in the count so I can relay an accurate number.

We are going to have our second hike in the winery at the Heritage Trail Vineyard in Lisbon, CT.

Our first hike was a great success even though alot of people didn't attend who said they were going to because of rain, though it didn't rain much.

From Previous hike:
Spoke with the owners and they are dog lovers like us, told us we can hike through the winery and then enjoy lunch and a tasting at their restaurant. They will let us eat at their outside seating with our dogs!!

They have an excellent restaurant and excellent wine! Also they have recently acquired a cheese farm and they have different types at their restaurant.

SO please plan on hiking and then enjoying the tasting and/ or some excellent lunch!! BTW their home made Gelato is AMAZING!!

Website:
http://www.heritagetr...

Directions:
http://maps.google.co...

Menu:
http://www.heritagetr...

Wine List:
http://www.heritagetr...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be there with my Blue Ford Edge, Fred will be there with his Go Kart.
item.name: Hike @ Heritage Trail Winery
